attributes.action: prevent the proposed closure of Rogate Primary School in West Sussex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please help us prevent the local council from closing our vibrant village school by signing this petition. We believe the council have not followed an open consultation process during the first phase of discussions and have not provided the *detailed* rationale for closing our school. We have an excellent OFSTED report from 2007, church within walking distance, open swimming pool, nature area, brand new special needs unit, and plenty of scope opportunities to expand the buildings/site to accommodate more pupils.

ALTHOUGH WE'RE KEEPING PETITION OPEN FOR 6 MONTHS PLEASE SIGN BEFORE ** 8TH APRIL 2008 ** AS THIS IS A KEY MILESTONE FOR THE SCHOOL.

Please help our cause - this affects the future of our children and local rural community.
